## 原始HTML内容

<a id="a-link"></a>
<script>
  localStorage.x5referer = "https://www.xiami.com/album/2102727406";	
  var link = document.getElementById("a-link");
  var isMobile = navigator.userAgent.match(/.*(iPhone|iPad|Android|ios|SymbianOS|Windows Phone).*/i);
  var host = isMobile ? "https://passport.xiami.com/?redirectURL=" : "https://passport.xiami.com/?redirectURL=";
  try {
	var hostValue = window.location.host;
	var parts = hostValue && hostValue.split('.');
	var exp = new Date();
	var maxAge = -100;
	exp.setTime(exp.getTime() + maxAge);
	var cookie = 'x5secdata=;maxAge=' + maxAge + ';expires=' + exp.toUTCString() + ';path=/;domain=.' + parts.slice(-2).join('.') + ';';
	document.cookie = cookie;
	document.cookie = cookie + 'Secure;SameSite=None';
  } catch(e) {}
  link.href = host + "https%3a%2f%2fwww.xiami.com:443/album/2102727406%2F_____tmd_____%2Fpage%2Flogin_jump%3Frand%3DS3WxGHAgAt756EpznwfNzJq2AFA2qBNla3j6EINUS8We9dazM_iKElp8DwVSHZUevpC41Bx7RzivXIj9RnZgdg%26_lgt_%3D8ebc44d990df4851b0baaca22f422e52___14041___a6a6f5142c39530c5fe35f24f265e911___&uuid=8ebc44d990df4851b0baaca22f422e52";
  link.click();
 window._config_ = {
   "action": "login",
   "url": "https://passport.xiami.com/?redirectURL=https%3a%2f%2fwww.xiami.com:443/album/2102727406%2F_____tmd_____%2Fpage%2Fclose_iframe_page%3Frand%3DS3WxGHAgAt756EpznwfNzJq2AFA2qBNla3j6EINUS8We9dazM_iKElp8DwVSHZUevpC41Bx7RzivXIj9RnZgdg%26uuid%3D8ebc44d990df4851b0baaca22f422e52%26_lgt_%3D8ebc44d990df4851b0baaca22f422e52___14041___a6a6f5142c39530c5fe35f24f265e911___",
   "h5url": "https://passport.xiami.com/?redirectURL=https%3a%2f%2fwww.xiami.com:443/album/2102727406%2F_____tmd_____%2Fpage%2Fclose_iframe_page%3Frand%3DS3WxGHAgAt756EpznwfNzJq2AFA2qBNla3j6EINUS8We9dazM_iKElp8DwVSHZUevpC41Bx7RzivXIj9RnZgdg%26uuid%3D8ebc44d990df4851b0baaca22f422e52%26_lgt_%3D8ebc44d990df4851b0baaca22f422e52___14041___a6a6f5142c39530c5fe35f24f265e911___",

localStorage.x5referer = "https://www.xiami.com/album/2102727406";	
  var link = document.getElementById("a-link");
  var isMobile = navigator.userAgent.match(/.*(iPhone|iPad|Android|ios|SymbianOS|Windows Phone).*/i);
  var host = isMobile ? "https://passport.xiami.com/?redirectURL=" : "https://passport.xiami.com/?redirectURL=";
  try {
	var hostValue = window.location.host;
	var parts = hostValue && hostValue.split('.');
	var exp = new Date();
	var maxAge = -100;
	exp.setTime(exp.getTime() + maxAge);
	var cookie = 'x5secdata=;maxAge=' + maxAge + ';expires=' + exp.toUTCString() + ';path=/;domain=.' + parts.slice(-2).join('.') + ';';
	document.cookie = cookie;
	document.cookie = cookie + 'Secure;SameSite=None';
  } catch(e) {}
  link.href = host + "https%3a%2f%2fwww.xiami.com:443/album/2102727406%2F_____tmd_____%2Fpage%2Flogin_jump%3Frand%3DS3WxGHAgAt756EpznwfNzJq2AFA2qBNla3j6EINUS8We9dazM_iKElp8DwVSHZUevpC41Bx7RzivXIj9RnZgdg%26_lgt_%3D8ebc44d990df4851b0baaca22f422e52___14041___a6a6f5142c39530c5fe35f24f265e911___&uuid=8ebc44d990df4851b0baaca22f422e52";
  link.click();
